'''''Minecraft: Norse Mythology (Original Soundtrack)''''' is the fourth soundtrack for ''Minecraft'' released by [[Gareth Coker]], which contains music from the Norse Mythology mash-up pack. It was released on December 19, 2017, alongside the Legacy Console Edition update which added said pack.
